main_text.sentence: The probability of fixation pfix of deleterious mutants drops exponentially with the population size, pfix = [1 - exp(2s)]/ [1 - exp(2sNe)], where s is the selective disadvantage of the deleterious mutation [31].
Hence lesions in the mtDNA can prove to be more deleterious [6].

Note that changes caused by IS6110 can be not only beneficial, but also neutral or deleterious [31].
The fixation of even a deleterious mutation is possible if the population undergoes an extreme bottleneck [5].

In general the ω values are usually below 0.5 due to the deleterious effects of most amino acid mutations [28].
The term lipotoxicity describes the deleterious effect of chronic FFA elevation on insulin secretion from the pancreatic β-cell [34].
